aoop.asteroids

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • aoop.asteroids.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    This Utils class contains a couple of useful functions that are used in multiple places of the program.
    Author:
    qqwy

      static int floorMod(int a, int b)
      Returns the remainder of dividing a by b.
      static java.lang.String generateName()
      Function that generates a nice-looking (First or Last) name.
      Readability is improved by alternating between a vowel and a consonant.
      Vowels that are common in the English language have a higher chance to end up in the names.
      Names have between 3 and 12 characters.
      This function always terminates.

    • Method Detail

      • floorMod

        public static int floorMod(int a,
           int b)
        Returns the remainder of dividing a by b. (rounded towards zero. This will never return a negative number)
        In Java 8, this functionality is built-in in the Math library. But, as we use Java 7, we have to make it ourselves.
        Returns:
        the result of the floorMod operation: (a % b)
        See Also:
        floorMod(double, double)

      • floorMod

        public static double floorMod(double a,
              double b)
        Returns the remainder of dividing a by b. (rounded towards zero. This will never return a negative number)
        If `b` is infinite, simply returns `a`.
        See Also:
        floorMod(int, int)

      • imagMultR

      • imagMultI

        public static double imagMultI(double a,
               double b,
               double c,
               double d)

      • generateName

        public static java.lang.String generateName()
        Function that generates a nice-looking (First or Last) name.
        Readability is improved by alternating between a vowel and a consonant.
        Vowels that are common in the English language have a higher chance to end up in the names.
        Names have between 3 and 12 characters.
        This function always terminates.
        Returns:
        the generated name
